p: Sheep milk is highly nutritious [ 1] and cheese such as feta, which is the most well-known Greek protected designation of origin product, have gained significant acceptance worldwide. It is a high-quality white-brined cheese produced from sheep milk or a mixture of sheep and goat milk (â‰¤30%) [ 12]. It has a salty and slightly pungent flavor [ 13]. Nowadays in Greece, the majority of Feta cheese is manufactured in well-organized cheese dairies using pasteurized milk and lactic acid bacteria (LAB) as starter cultures [ 14]. Yoghurt is another very popular fermented dairy product which has gained significant acceptance worldwide, and its nutritional and health benefits have been well known for centuries [ 15]. It is an excellent source of high biological value protein, essential amino acids, calcium, phosphorus, vitamins and trace minerals such as magnesium and zinc [ 15].
